text: 1.25: 2 Ko 13.4Kha nuiana gumgi, mbe wari won ndɨkndɨgira kha ndɨkndɨgar Fhe Bakɨme mbui, ana ndɨkndɨgi mbari ŋanŋangiap, mben ndɨkndɨgi kambarigi fhuvara. Mbe mba ndɨkndɨgi ga mbui, nta guigira ndɨkndɨgi guari fhuvara. Fhe Bakɨmen ndɨkndɨgi nta guigira mben ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ kambarigi. Mbe vhɨra kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen ŋkasŋkagi mbari gari, nta ŋkasŋka ki fhu. Mbe fhura maaŋ nzuai. Anan ŋkasŋkagi, nta guigira ŋkasŋka bakɨme kav, ntan ŋkasŋka guigira gumgir ŋkasŋka kambarigi.
